title: Manga Plus Adds Akira Moriguchi's Stop! I'm Falling for You! Manga
partialText: Manga launched in <cite>Tonari no Young Jump</cite> in March 2025

title: Scheduled Down Time
partialText: Anime News Network will be offline for server upgrades from 10:00 am to 11:00 am EST on Monday, February 9th. We apologize for any inconveniences.

title: Kadokawa Releases 'Farewell, My Firsts,' Shino & Ren Manga in English
partialText: <cite>Farewell, My Firsts</cite> releases on February 10; <cite>Shino & Ren</cite> on February 13

title: The Classroom of a Black Cat and a Witch Anime Announces Ending Theme Song Artist
partialText: Spira Spica to perform 'Tune Up'

title: Cosmic Princess Kaguya! Anime Film Gets Theatrical Release
partialText: Film to screen for one week beginning February 20

title: Lady Gaga, Trevor Noah, Blackpink's Jisoo Name Their Favorite Pokémon
partialText: Charles Leclerc, Lamine Yamal, Maitreyi Ramakrishnan, Young Miko also star in Super Bowl ad

title: The Case Book of Arne Anime Casts Yūko Miyamura as Red Riding Hood
partialText: Phantom Thief Red Riding Hood appears in episode 7 on February 18

title: The Super Mario Galaxy Movie Airs Super Bowl Commercial
partialText: Film opens in U.S., U.K. on April 1 &  in Japan on April 24

title: NEJIGANAMETA's Ladies on Top Manga Gets Live-Action Series
partialText: ONE N' ONLY leader Hayato Takao, <i>Donbrothers'</i> Kohaku Shida star in role-reversal rom-com debuting on March 5

title: Observation Records of My Fiancée Anime's New Video Reveals 4 Cast Members
partialText: Ayumu Murase, Ayaka Ōhashi, Shun Horie, Iori Saeki join anime's cast

title: Ichijōma Mankitsu Gurashi! TV Anime Unveils 4 More Characters, New Teaser
partialText: Series debuts in April

title: Hana-Kimi TV Anime Presents 3 More Cast Members With 2nd Visual
partialText: Masaaki Mizunaka, Junya Enoki, Takehito Koyasu (in reprisal from CD drama) join cast

title: Dorohedoro Anime Season 2's Visual Reveals Updated Staff, April 1 Global Debut
partialText: Miho Sugiura, Itsuku Onishi credited for art direction, color key in new season

title: 1st New Made in Abyss Anime Film's Teaser Unveils More Staff, Fall Opening
partialText: Kevin Penkin returns to score <cite>Made in Abyss: Mezameru Shinpi</cite>, 1st of 3 films
